abstract: Christie's will auction late actress Elizabeth Taylor's collection of jewelry on evening of December 13, 2011; only handful of jewelry auctions take place at night, when they generate more glamour and excitement; sales of the pieces are expected to bring in $30 million.
snippet: A handful of auctions of the most stunning jewelry in the world are held at night, and Christie’s event featuring the actress Elizabeth Taylor’s collection is one of them.
lead_paragraph: A handful of auctions of the most stunning jewelry in the world are held at night, and Christie’s event featuring the actress Elizabeth Taylor’s collection is one of them.

headline.main: Selling the Sparkle as the Stars Twinkle
headline.print_headline: Selling the Sparkle As the Stars Twinkle
headline.seo: Elizabeth Taylor’s Gems to Be Auctioned at Night
